item.title: HOOD
item.description: score:99 Chances: Cryptocurrency prices retreated after CPI report, but Bitcoin halving event is approaching. Robinhood offering retirement accounts with 3% match on transfers or rollovers from existing retirement accounts. Retail engagement accelerated in the first quarter. Synovus unveils a payment solution for commercial banking clients.
